item.title: gpg key expired when doing 'apt-get update'
item.description: If you're seeing something like this: 1W: An error occurred during the signature verification. The repository is not updated and the previous index files will be used. GPG error: https://packagecloud.io/github/git-lfs/ubuntu xenial InRelease: The following signatures couldn't be verified because the public key is not available: NO_PUBKEY 6B05F25D762E3157 2W: Failed to fetch https://packagecloud.io/github/git-lfs/ubuntu/dists/xenial/InRelease The following signatures couldn't be verified because the public key is not available: NO_PUBKEY 6B05F25D762E3157 3W: Some index files failed to download.
